members.name: IDBObjectStoreSync
members.description: An object to access the newly created object store.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to store into the index.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A key to use for identifying the record.

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: The key for the stored record.

parameters.name: CONSTRAINT_ERR
parameters.description: If a record exists in this index with a key corresponding to the key parameter or the index is auto-populated, or if no record exists with a key corresponding to the value parameter in the index's referenced object store.

parameters.name: DATA_ERR
parameters.description: If this object store uses out-of-line keys, and the key parameter was not passed.

parameters.name: SERIAL_ERR
parameters.description: If the data being stored could not be serialized by the internal structured cloning algorithm.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of a new index.

parameters.name: keyPath
parameters.description: The key path used by the new index.

parameters.name: unique
parameters.description: If true, keys in the index must be unique; if false, duplicate keys are allowed.

parameters.name: IDBIndexSync
parameters.description: An object to access the newly created index.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key that identifies the record to be retrieved.

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: The value retrieved from the object store.

parameters.name: SERIAL_ERR
parameters.description: If the data being stored could not be deserialized by the internal structured cloning algorithm.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If no record exists in this index for the given key.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The key range to use as the cursor's range.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The cursor's required direction.

parameters.name: IDBIndexSync
parameters.description: An object for accessing the index.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If no records exist in this index for the requested key range.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the index to open.

parameters.name: IDBIndexSync
parameters.description: An object to access the index.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If the index with the given name does not exist in the connected database.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to be stored in the record.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key to be used to identify the record.

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: The key for the stored record.

parameters.name: CONSTRAINT_ERR
parameters.description: If noOverwrite was true, and a record exists in this index for the given key or this index is auto-populated; or if no record exists with the given key in the index's referenced object store.

parameters.name: DATA_ERR
parameters.description: If this object store uses out-of-line keys and no key generator, but no key was given.

parameters.name: SERIAL_ERR
parameters.description: If the data being stored could not be serialized by the internal structured cloning algorithm.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the records to be removed.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If a record does not exist in this index with the given key.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the existing index to remove.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If an index with the given name does not exist in the connected database.

members.name: CONSTRAINT_ERR
members.description: If an object store with the same name (based on case-sensitive comparison) already exists in the connected database.

members.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
members.description: If an object store with the given name (based on case-sensitive comparison) already exists in the connected database.

members.name: IDBTransactionSync
members.description: An object to access the newly created transaction.

parameters.name: NON_TRANSIENT_ERR
parameters.description: If this transaction has already been committed or aborted.

parameters.name: NON_TRANSIENT_ERR
parameters.description: If this transaction has already been committed or aborted.

parameters.name: RECOVERABLE_ERR
parameters.description: If this transaction's scope is dynamic, and the browser cannot commit all of the changes due to another transaction.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the requested object store.

parameters.name: IDBObjectStoreSync
parameters.description: An object for accessing the requested object store.

parameters.name: NOT_FOUND_ERR
parameters.description: If the requested object store is not in this transaction's scope.

members.name: TIMEOUT_ERR
members.description: If reserving all the database objects identified in storeNames takes longer than the timeout interval.
